name: advanced_chart
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool chart_img.
Tool description: CHART-IMG.COM API designed to take screenshots of the most popular crypto charts and tools.
API description: Fetches a real-time advanced chart image from TradingView using specified parameters.

symbol.description: A valid TradingView symbol. Example: 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT', 'BINANCE:BTCUSDTPERP'. Default is 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT'.

studies.description:
`The field support multiple values.`

| Indicator                             | Study    | Default                       |
| ------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------------- |
| Accumulation Distribution             | ACCD     | -                             |
| Advance Decline Ratio                 | ADR      | ADR:9                         |
| Aroon                                 | AROON    | AROON:14                      |
| Average True Range                    | ATR

format.description: The format of the chart image. Supported formats are 'png' and 'jpeg'. Default is 'png'.

theme.description: The color theme of the chart. Supported themes are 'light' and 'dark'. Default is 'dark'.

interval.description: The interval of the chart. Supported intervals include '1m', '3m', '5m', '15m', '30m', '45m', '1h', '2h', '3h', '4h', '1d', '1w'. Default is '1d'.

width.description:
`The field must be within the valid range.`

Minimum: `320`

| Plan  | Max width |
| ----- | --------- |
| BASIC | 800 |

height.description:
`The field must be within the valid range.`

Minimum: `240`

| Plan  | Max height |
| ----- | --------- |
| BASIC | 600 |

timezone.description:
`The field must be valid timezone.`

| Timezone                       | Description                 |
| ------------------------------ | --------------------------- |
| Etc/UTC                        | UTC                         |
| Pacific/Honolulu               | (UTC-10) Honolulu           |
| America/Juneau                 | (UTC-9) Juneau              |
| America/Los_Angeles            | (UTC-8) Los Angeles         |
| America/Vancouver              | (UTC-8) Vancouver           |
| US/Mountain
